definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The amount of electrolyte leakage was highly related to the treating time and concentration of toxin.
sentences.chinese: 且电解质外渗的程度与毒素浓度和处理时间呈正比。

sentences.english: Try to drink plenty of water or electrolyte fluids to get rid of stomach virus.
sentences.chinese: 为了消除肠胃感染病毒，要喝大量的水或电解质液体。

sentences.english: The effect of electrolyte on high frequency electrical property of wet tantalum capacitors was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了电解质对高频液体钽电容器电性能的影响。

sentences.english: This paper worked on the pre-electrolysis process in silicon electrorefining.
sentences.chinese: 电解质的预电解净化是该方法成功的基础。

sentences.english: The synthesis and application of cationic polyelectrolyte with high density charge.
sentences.chinese: 高密度电荷阳离子聚电解质的制备及应用。

sentences.english: SnO 2 in the aluminium electrolytes was discussed by AES in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了发射光谱法测定铝电解质中二氧化锡。

sentences.english: The critical electrolyte concentration of MCs was also lower too in periodontitis patients.
sentences.chinese: 牙周炎组肥大细胞的临界电解质浓度值也较低。

sentences.english: The patients following transsphenoidal surgery of pituitary adenoma may develop disturbances in water and electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 垂体瘤经蝶手术后可发生水和电解质失调。

sentences.english: The invention provides a non-aqueous electrolyte battery improving energy density.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种提高了能量密度的非水电解质电池。

sentences.english: Recently, in drug controlled release system, polyelectrolyte complexes have been rewarded much attention.
sentences.chinese: 近年来聚电解质复合物在药物控释领域受到重视。

sentences.english: This silicon solid electrolyte of lead accumulator includes two components, A and B, both of which have been clarified.
sentences.chinese: 一种铅蓄电池硅固电解质及其制造方法。

sentences.english: Without electrolytes, the body can not function.
sentences.chinese: 没有电解质，身体难以运转起来。

sentences.english: Potential variation of thin oil film in electrolyte is an electrochemical process.
sentences.chinese: 薄层油膜在电解质中的电位变化是一个电化学过程。

sentences.english: It uses vanadium in both electrolytes.
sentences.chinese: 当时两种电解质均使用了钒化合物。

sentences.english: Blood, liver and kidney functions, electrolytes are normal.
sentences.chinese: 血常规，肝肾功能，电解质均属正常范围。

sentences.english: Under the same temperature, the electrolyte exosmosis rate of tetraploid plants were lower than diploid plants.
sentences.chinese: 相同低温下，辣木四倍体的电解质外渗率低于二倍体。
